summary: This cable discusses a news story about Lee Harvey Oswald and the CIA in Japan. It requests the name and phone number of the project office responsible for declassification of Kennedy assassination papers, as a UPI reporter is about to file a story based on local research and an interview with a retired Marine officer who claimed Oswald was recruited by the CIA while stationed in Japan in the 1950s.
title: NEWS STORY ON LEE HARVEY OSWALD AND CIA IN JAPAN
